experiences.description: Completed 5 websites for small businesses, increasing online visibility by 30%. Set up optimized SEO strategies and enabled email subscription systems to enhance client outreach. Delivered custom solutions using WordPress and Squarespace alongside traditional web technologies.

Monitored 50 client systems to ensure optimal functionality and prevent downtime. Managed help desk operations and created 10 error resolution guides to improve troubleshooting workflows. Fixed 50+ client system issues and provided technical support and troubleshooting system problems.

Built 12+ Arduino projects using C++ and Python to teach microcontroller concepts, increasing member retention by 25%. Led a team of 3 developers to launch the GSU SHPE chapter's online presence, securing $1,500 in sponsorships. Assisted 10+ members with Python assignments in Data Structures & Algorithms and System-Level Programming, achieving 90% average scores.

Mentored and supported a cohort of 7 students through weekly 1:1 check-ins, addressing project challenges and ensuring progress with course materials. Facilitated workshops, in-class activities, and icebreakers to foster an engaging and collaborative learning environment. Represented CodePath at Georgia State University events, increasing program visibility and driving student enrollment. Collaborated with CodePath staff and fellow Tech Fellows to improve the student experience through feedback loops and curriculum enhancements.
